alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; Northwest Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 11:44AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1230 PM MST... At 1142 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Wittmann, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rainfall could cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Surprise, Wittmann, Sun City West, Beardsley, Lake Pleasant and Vistancia. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 129 and 139. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 5 and 26. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 119 and 123, and between mile markers 126 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; Northwest Valley
